item.title: Has Russia’s Shadow Fleet Added Sabotage to Its List?
item.description: Russia has assembled a fleet of hundreds of vessels to covertly ship its oil. With so many ships at sea, the idea of using some to cause havoc may be ...

item.title: Kazakhstan Plane Crash Survivors Describe Chaos on Azerbaijan Airlines Flight
item.description: Flight attendants and a passenger described the moments before an Azerbaijan Airlines flight went down in Kazakhstan, killing dozens.

item.title: Stowaway on a Delta Seattle-Hawaii Flight Is Caught Before Takeoff
item.description: The person, who boarded the flight without a ticket, was detected as the plane was preparing to take off for Hawaii on Christmas Eve.
